role_description: An Ansible role that installs duf (a better df alternative) on nearly any system
role_description_full_overview: [duf](https://github.com/muesli/duf) is a Disk Usage/Free Utility - a better 'df' alternative. It displays a chart within your terminal that gives you an overview of hard-drive usage statistics.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs duf (a better df alternative) on nearly any system.
